title: John Lee (political scientist)
summary: John Lee is an Australian academic and policy expert working on international economic and security affairs with a focus on the Indo-Pacific. Lee was a senior adviser to Australian Foreign Minister Julie Bishop from 2016 to 2018. He is also a senior fellow at the Hudson Institute in Washington, DC and an Adjunct Professor and Senior Fellow at the United States Studies Centre at the University of Sydney. Lee was a board member of the Institute for Regional Security (formerly Kokoda Foundation) from 2012 until August 2016.
